name: Viral Space
description:
OLA!
This is my first game with unity I hope you enjoy it :)

The Bad Story :D

People were forced to leave the earth and go into space when viruses invaded the Earth. But the surprise is that viruses have evolved, invaded space, and have evolved and multiplied in a huge amount and tried to control other planets and galaxies.

In this game, we are trying, with each other, with the most powerful weapons and techniques to defeat viruses to rid the space of the viruses.

Controllers
  • WASD for moving
  • Q to call the rescue bots, E to shoot a nuke
  • Left-Click to shoot
